319798.エドアルドは <pc>が採ってきた\n宝石を削って 美しく輝く瞳を作り\nそれを:
Eduardo sharpens the jewel that had brought him, turning them into beautiful, shining pupils. He then attached
them to the eyes of the doll...

319799.「さぁ 目覚めておくれ……愛しき人……。\n 僕の天使……ルーミリアよ！:
Come now, wake up, my beloved...
My angel, Lumeria...!

319800.「……あー。\n 何も 起きねえみたいだな。: Ah, um... Nothing seems to be happenin'.

319801.「どうして！ ようやく 完璧な身体が完成した！\n 身体さえあれば 戻ってきてく:
But why?! I've finally finished this perfect body! With this body you should be able to come back!! So why won't you wake up!?
Lumeriaaaaaa!!

319802.「この町の守護天使様は もう\n いなくなってしまったのでしょうか……？:
Has this town's Guardian Angel already
disappeared...?

319804.「天使像のマギエルさんが 言ってたでしょ。\n 守護天使は 各地で眠ってるって。:
Magiel told us that the Guardian Angels are
sleeping in all different places. They've
gotta be somewhere here in town.

319805.「それに 前にね この町で\n 不思議な存在の気配を感じたの。\n もしかして:
And besides, I felt a mysterious presence in
this town once before... Maybe it was an
angel...?

319806.「……本当かッ！？\n 彼女は 今 どこにいる！\n もったいぶってないで 早く:
Is that true?! Where is she now?!
Out with it already!!

319807.「わかんない……どこにいるかまでは……。\n エドアルドさん やめて……。\n:
I...don't know where it is...
Please stop, Eduardo...you're hurting
me...

319809.「う……僕は いったい……？\n たしか 結晶のバケモノに\n 身体を貫かれて:
W...what am I...? The last thing I remember
I was struck by a crystal-looking monster,
and then...

319810.「良かった……。\n あなたのマネをして 身体を作ってみたのですが\n 上手くで:
Thank goodness... I tried making an exact
copy of your body, but I wasn't sure if I
could do it right...

319811.「新しい身体の具合は いかがですか。\n どこか 痛むところは ありませんか……:
How does your new body feel? Are you feeling
any pain...?

319812.「……はじめまして。\n 私は ルーミリア……です。:
Nice to meet you...
My name...is Lumeria.

319813.「僕は ずっと 待っていたんだ。\n 愛しい人が戻ってくる その時を。\n 町を:
I've been waiting for so long...for the day
that my beloved would finally return.
I protect this town for her sake...

319814.「もう一度 彼女に会うためだったら\n 僕は なんだってやってやる。\n ……だ:
I would do anything just to see her again.
But I'm not able to do it alone...

319815.「どうしても ルーミリアに会いたいんだ。\n キミたちのチカラを 貸してほしい…:
I must see Lumeria again, and I need your
help! Please, I'm begging you...!

319816.「ルーミリアさん……守護天使様は\n いったい どちらにいらっしゃるのでしょう。:
Lumeria... Just where could this Guardian
Angel be? Do you have any ideas, Eduardo?

319817.「うーん……彼女については\n わからないことが多すぎるんだ。内気で\n 自分の:
Hrrmm... There are a lot of things I don't
know about her. She was quite shy and never
really spoke about herself...

319818.「ムニエカ地方の東の高台に かつて\n ルーミリアが暮らしていた小屋がある。そこ:
East of Munieka is a cabin on a cliff where
Lumeria used to live. There may be some
clues left behind there.

319819.「僕も あそこを 散々調べてはみたんだが\n 残念ながら 何もつかめなかった。キ:
I've looked around that place myself, but
sadly wasn't able to find anything. Maybe
you'll have better luck than I did...

319820.「あー でも今は はしごが落ちていて\n 空でも飛ばないと 小屋には行けないんだ:
Ah, but...the ladder is gone, so you'll have
to fly to get to the cabin. Well, I'm sure
you'll figure something out. Yup!

319821.「僕も行きたいところだが 住民の修理の予定が\n 入っていて 手が離せなくてね…:
I'd love to accompany you, but I have to
attend to some repairs for my residents.
Mudara, can you go with them?

319822.「えっと……あの ご主人様……。\n ドロテアは……できれば……。\n そのう…:
Well, um... Master...
If Mudara could, well...

319823.「……いえ なんでもありません。\n みなさまと いっしょに\n ルーミリア様を:
N-no, it's nothing! Mudara will join you
in searching for Lumeria...

319824.「ありがとう さすがは 僕のドロテア！\n 必ずや 愛しのルーミリアを\n 見つ:
Oh, thank you! I knew I could count on you,
my Mudara! Surely you will find my beloved
Lumeria!

319825.「……ドロテア 元気ないね。\n どうしたんだろう？:
Mudara doesn't look so good...
What's the matter?

319827.チュピちゃんが 天井に体当たりすると\nなんと 天井の板が外れた！:
Chupie smashes into the ceiling, going right
through the ceiling boards!

319828.チュピちゃんは 天井裏から\n本のようなものを 持ってきた……。:
Chupie then brings what appears to be a book
from the attic...

319829.「……かーっ！ まさか\n 天井裏なんかに 隠してやがったとはな。\n どこ探し:
Jeez! To think they hid somethin' like that
up in the ceiling. No wonder we couldn't
find it.

319830.「どうやら これも\n ルーミリアさんの日記のようですね。\n さっそく 読んで:
Apparently this is also one of Lumeria's
diaries. Let's have a look...

319831.「私の名は ルーミリア……。\n かつて ムニエカの守護天使と\n 呼ばれていた:
"My name is Lumeria... I was once called
the Guardian Angel of Munieka..."

319832.ジア・クト念晶体と名乗る 侵略者による\n襲撃の果てに ムニエカの町は\nそこに:
"After an attack by invaders calling
themselves the Dia Kut Telecrystal, Munieka
was destroyed along with its inhabitants."

319833.理不尽な運命から なんとしても\n愛する住民たちを救いたかった 私は\n彼らに:
"I wanted to save my beloved people at any
cost, so I gave them all new vessels...
The bodies of dolls..."

319834.ムニエカ地方の森に残された 創生のチカラで\n彼らの魂と 人形の身体を結びつけ\:
"With the power of creation left within the forests near Munieka, I succeeded in connecting their souls with the dolls,
which brought them back to life."

319835.「エドアルドさんが 話していた通りだ。\n やっぱり ルーミリアさんが\n 守護:
Just as Eduardo said! Lumeria is a Guardian
Angel after all!

319836.神が創りたもうた人間と 寸分違わぬ身体を\n全員分作るのは 途方もない作業でした:
"It was a tremendous undertaking to create bodies that were exactly like the humans the Almighty had created...but with his help,
I was able to do so."

319837.長い長い時を経て ついに 私たちは\n愛する故郷ムニエカを 取り戻したのです。\:
"And finally, after so, so long...my beloved
homeland of Munieka returned once more.
I was so happy, that I could not stop crying."

319838.私たちは 決して 朽ちることのない\n永遠の平和と安寧を 手に入れた。\nこれで:
"We have gained eternal peace and tranquility
that will never perish. We can all live
happily ever after."

319839.けれど……ひとつだけ 気がかりがあります。\n今はまだ 小さな染みだけれど 捨て:
"However...there is just one thing that worries me. It is but a small stain now, but left unchecked it could gnaw away
at everyone and bring disaster to the town."

319840.ムニエカの地下にある 私の秘密の場所……。\nしばらくは そこに こもりきりにな:
"My secret place is underneath Munieka... I will be staying there for some time. Its keys shall be entrusted to three chosen
inhabitants."

319841.もう二度と ムニエカの町を……\n愛する人々を 失いたくはない。\n今度こそ 皆:
"I don't want to lose Munieka again...
the people that I love. This time, I have
to protect them..."

319842.「この後に 鍵の取り出し方が 書いてある！\n ……む～？ なんか へんてこりん:
After that, it looks like instructions on
where to get those keys! Hmm...it seems
a bit strange, though.

319843.「ルーミリアさんが 町のどこかに\n 今もいるのだとすれば……まだ捜していない\:
If Lumeria is still somewhere in town, then...
isn't it likely that they're somewhere we
haven't searched yet? Such as underground?

319844.「地下への入り口が どこにあるかまでは\n 現段階では わかりませんが まずは\:
We don't know where the entrance is just yet,
but first we should find those keys that the
diary mentioned.

319845.「鍵を託されたのは セアトロさん オルーサさん\n ロベールさんの３人。彼らに:
The keys were entrusted to Seatro, Orusa and
Robere. If give each of them the instructions
in the diary, then they will give us the keys.

319846.「あれ？ セアトロさんと オルーサさんは\n わかるんですけど ロベールさん……:
Huh? I know of Seatro and Orusa, but...Robere?
I don't think he lives in town...

319847.「……とりあえず 順番通り セアトロさんに\n 日記の指示を 試してみましょうか:
Well, in the meantime...let's go in order in
the diary and try Seatro's instructions first.
I'll leave the diary with you.

319850.「ドロテア？ えっと……何かあった？\n ルーミリアさんを 捜すことになってから:
Mudara? Umm...what's wrong? Ever since
we started looking for Lumeria, you've
looked really down...

319851.「あ <pc>様 ポルテ様……。\n ご心配をおかけし 申し訳ございません。:
Ah, <pc>, Porte...
Mudara apologies for causing you to
worry.

319852.「ルーミリア様のことを考えると\n 胸のこのあたりが 締めつけられるように\n:
When Mudara thinks of Lumeria, she feels a
tight pain in her chest, right here...
It's quite strange for just a doll...

319853.「ルーミリア様が 帰ってきたら ご主人様は\n お喜びになるでしょう。でも ドロ:
The Master will be so happy when Lumeria
comes back. But, for some reason, Mudara
is very afraid of that...

319854.「大好きなご主人様の 心からの願いなのに\n こんな風に 考えてしまうなんて\n:
How ungrateful Mudara is to think such things
about my beloved Master's most heartfelt
wishes...

319855.だいじなものから ルーミリアの日記を使い\n住民たちから 鍵を手に入れる手順を\:
For instructions on how to get the keys from
each resident, check out Lumeria's Diary
in your Key Items.

319859.「地下へおりる 階段があるな。\n かなり深くまで 続いているようだが……。:
There are stairs going down to the basement.
They seem to lead to a very deep level...

319860.「うう 寒い……。\n 前に 結晶の森で感じたのと同じだ。\n この先から 冷た:
Ugh, it's cold... It's the same as I felt in
the Crystalline Forest before. There is a
cold, sad feeling coming from up ahead...

319861.「私……この場所 知ってる……。\n ずっとずっと 昔に 来たことがある……？:
I know this place... I've been here a long,
long time ago...?

319863.「なんだいこりゃ……びっくり仰天だ！\n まさか 毎日見てる広場に\n こんな仕:
What a surprise! I never thought that such a
trick was hidden in the plaza that I see every
day!

319864.「ルーミリアの家で 何か\n 手がかりが 見つかったんだろう？\n 早く 見せて:
You found something in Rumilia's House, didn't
you? Let's see it soon!

319865.エドアルドに\nルーミリアの日記を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you like to give Eduardo a copy of
Lumeria's Diary?<yesno><close>

319866.「……<pc>？\n イジワルするのは 良くないと思うな。:
...<pc>? I don't think it's a good
idea to be a tease.

319867.エドアルドに\nルーミリアの日記を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you like to give Eduardo a copy of
Lumeria's Diary?<yesno><close>

319868.<pc>は エドアルドに\nルーミリアの日記を 渡した。:
<pc> gave Eduardo a copy of
Lumeria's Diary.

319869.「マーベラスッ！ 初めて会ったときから\n 天使のように可憐な人だと 思っていた:
Ma Honey! From the first time I met you, I
thought you were as lovely as an angel, but I
never thought you were a real angel!

319870.「町の中で まだ 捜していない場所は\n 日記に書いてあった 秘密の場所だけです:
The only place in town I haven't searched yet is the secret place mentioned in the diary. Perhaps Lumeria's soul is in the back of
this...

319871.「でかしたぞッ 諸君！\n では さっそく 我が麗しの天使を\n 迎えにいくとし:
Well done, gentlemen! Let's get out of here
and welcome my beautiful angel!

319874.「ア……俺の身体は ドコダ……？\n 人形の身体じゃなイ 人間のカラダ……。\n:
Where is my body? It's not a doll body, it's a
human body. My body... was destroyed by a
crystalline monster.

319875.「何千年も 何万年も\n アタシは５歳のまま。時ガ止まったまま……。\n ネエ:
For thousands of years, for tens of thousands
of years, I will be five years old. Time has
stopped... Hey, when did this happen?

319876.「アア アンタたちの 生きてる身体……\n キレイだネェ うらやましイネェ……。:
Oh, your living bodies...they are so
beautiful...Tails is so beautiful...! Please
give us a blessing...!

319877.「ゲゲッ！？ こんなときに\n みんなそろって 故障かよ！ おいエドアルド！\n:
Geez! At a time like this, we've all had
breakdowns! Hey, Eduardo, I hope you didn't do
something wrong again!

319878.「誓って 何もしていないとも！\n 毎日のメンテナンスも 欠かさず\n おこなっ:
I swear I didn't do anything! I did my daily
maintenance without fail, and there was
nothing wrong with it.

319879.「うう……少しでも早く ルーミリアのもとへ\n 向かいたいところだが 町のみんな:
Ugh...I'd like to get to Lumeria as soon as
possible, but I can't just leave everyone in
town like this.

319880.「キミたち 悪いが 先に行ってくれないか？\n みんなを修理したら 僕も\n す:
Hey, you guys, you mind going on ahead? I'll
be on my way as soon as I get everyone fixed
up!

319882.「ドロテアは 知っていました……。\n みんなが こうなることも 全部……。\n:
Mudara knew... Mudara knew this was going to
happen to all of them. Why... why...?

319883.「これは……？\n ルーミリアさんは この場所で\n いったい 何を……。: What on earth is Lumeria doing here?

319886.「……ええっ ルーミリアさん！？\n こ こんな あっさり\n 見つかっちゃって: What? Is it okay that she found me so easily?

319887.「いえ ポルテ様……。\n これは まぼろしです。\n この地に封じられし 守護:
No, Mr. Porte... This is a mirage. The memory
of a protected angel sealed in this land...

319896.「町で感じた悪寒は これだったんだ……。\n ムニエカのみんなが 長い間\n た:
The chill I felt in the town was this...the
soul injury that everyone in Munieka has been
storing up for a long time...

319897.「永遠の生命なんて どだい 無茶な話なんだ。\n どうにもならないことを 無理や:
Eternal life is a crazy story. Trying to force
something that can't be done, won't do any
good.

319898.「ルーミリアさんは……間違えたのでしょう。\n 愛する者を 守ろうとするあまり\:
Mr. Lumeria...must have made a mistake. In
trying to protect the ones you love, you have
lost sight of what is important.

319899.「かつての私も オルストフさまを……\n 竜族を救いたい一心で 過ちを犯しました:
In the past, I too made the mistake of wanting
to save Ms. Orstov...Nadravian. So, I
understand her feelings very well.

319900.「このまま 放っておいたら\n 町のみんなは どうなっちゃうんだろう……。:
I wonder what will happen to everyone in the
town if we don't do something about it...

319901.「それこそ ロクな結果にならんだろうさ。\n この先にいるはずの ルーミリア本人:
That's not going to end well. We'll just have
to let Lumeria herself, who should be up
ahead, do something about it. Let's go!

319904.「ここにも 上の階と同じように\n ルーミリアさんの記憶が\n 残ってるみたいだ:
It seems that Lumeria's memory remains here as
well as on the upper floor...

319917.「町の様子を見るに ルーミリアが姿を消す前に\n 浄化装置は 完成したようだが…:
By the looks of the town, it appears that the
purification system was completed before
Lumeria disappeared.

319918.「ルーミリアは 住民たちの悪意に\n 耐えることが できなかったんだろう。\n:
Lumeria must not have been able to withstand
the malice of the inhabitants. This may be the
reason for her disappearance...

319919.「……卑怯者！ 自分のしたことに 向き合わず\n 被害者ぶって 勝手に逃げて！\:
...a coward! You never faced up to what you did, played the victim, and ran away on your own! All of this is the result of your own
weakness!

319920.「あなたのせいで 町のみんなは……\n エドアルド様は 今も 苦しんでいるのに！:
Because of you, everyone in this town... even
though Master Eduardo is suffering right now!
I...hate you...!

319922.「お おい！ どうしたんだ ドロテア……。\n お前さんらしく ないじゃないか。:
Hey, hey...what's up Mudara..! What's the
matter with you, Mudara...? This is not like
you.

319923.「いえ……これが 本当の私なんです。\n 臆病で 性根の腐った 汚くて醜い私……:
No...this is the real me. I'm a cowardly,
rotten-natured, dirty, ugly me... I've been
turning away from it all this time...

319926.「ルーミリアが話していた\n 浄化の聖花石ってのは アレか……？:
The holy flower stone of purification that
Lumeria was talking about...?

319927.「ええ……そして あのモヤのようなものが\n 町の人々から吸収した 魂のケガレ…:
Yes...and that blur of a thing is the soul
injury absorbed from the people of the town...

319928.「うっ……町のみんなの 負の感情が\n 流れ込んでくる。ルーミリアさんは\n 毎:
Ugh...the negative feelings of everyone in the
town are pouring in...Lumeria has to deal with
this every day...

319929.「ケガレが たまりすぎて\n 浄化しきれなくなってしまっている……。\n 一刻も:
The accumulation of the injured has become too
much to purify... We must deal with it as soon
as possible...

319930.「ですが ルーミリアさんの魂らしきものは\n どこにも 見あたりません。\n こ:
But I can't find Lumeria's soul anywhere. I
thought she would be here...

319932.「さあ ルーミリアは どこにいるんだい？\n 人形も連れてきたし 準備万端だ！\:
Now, where is Lumeria? I've brought the doll
and everything is ready! Don't be shy. Tell us
where she is!

319933.「どこだい？ 僕のルーミリア！\n 見てくれ キミの身体を 作ったんだよ。\n:
Where is it? My Lumeria! My Lumeria, look what
I've made of you. Stop hiding and come out!

319934.「……おおおおおッ！\n 動いた！ ルーミリアが動いたぞ！！: ...Oh, oh, oh! It moved! Lumeria is moving!

319935.「そこだね！\n 今行くよ ルーミリア！: There you are! I'm coming, Lumeria!

319936.「エドアルドさん！？ それは違うの！\n すごく 危険なものだから\n 近づいち:
Mr. Eduardo! That's not right! It's a very
dangerous thing, don't go near it!

319937.「ハッハッハッハッ！ 何を言っているんだい？\n ほらごらん この身体に入りたが:
Ha ha ha ha! What are you talking about? Look,
Lumeria wants to get into this body, and she
wants to meet me!

319938.「バカなこと 言ってんじゃねえ！\n そんなヤバそうなの どう見たって\n 天使:
Don't say stupid things! There's no way she's
an angel no matter how you look at it!

319939.「……うるさいッ！\n この僕が 間違えるはずがないだろう！\n ここにいるのは:
Shut up! There's no way I could make a
mistake! I'm sure it's Lumeria that's here!

319940.「あああ うんざり うんざりだッ！\n 僕は こんなに 努力しているのに\n い:
I'm fed up. I'm fed up! I'm trying so hard,
but no matter how long I wait, you never come
back!

319941.「毎日毎日毎日 変わりばえのない 退屈な日々。\n 愛しいキミがいない町で 木偶:
Day after day, day after day, the same old, same old boredom. I've had enough of spending my days taking care of wooden dolls in a town
without my beloved YOU!

319942.「そうさ 他のヤツらなんて どうだっていい。\n ルーミリア……キミだけがいれば:
Yes, I don't care about the others,
Lumeria...as long as there's only YOU...!
Hahahahahaha...!

319944.「ケガレに 近づいたからです。\n エドアルド様は 誰よりも\n この町に 尽く:
Eduardo-sama did more for this town than
anyone else...

319945.「誰よりも 魂をすり減らし\n ケガレの影響を 受けやすかった彼を\n ここには:
I didn't want him anywhere near this place,
where his soul was more worn out and more
susceptible to injury than anyone else...

319946.「エドアルド様……。\n それ以上 ケガレに 近づいてはなりません。\n あなた:
Dear Eduardo... Do not go any closer to
Kegare. Your soul will be broken...

319947.「私は 貴方を 失いたくない。\n 貴方を 愛しているから……。\n お願いです:
I don't want to lose you. Because I love
you... Please, please come back!

319948.「……僕とルーミリアの 邪魔をするな。\n お前のような クソ人形の言うことなど:
Don't get in the way of me and Lumeria. Who
would listen to a shitty puppet like you?

319950.「さぁ 目覚めよ！\n 僕の天使……ルーミリアよ！: Come on, wake up! My angel...Lumeria!

319951.「ああ なんと 美しい……。\n やっと 帰ってきてくれたんだね。\n 僕のルー:
Oh, how beautiful... You finally came back. My
Lumeria..!

319952.「ル ルルル ルーミリァ……。\n ワタシ ルーミリア？\n キャハッ キャハハ: Le Lulu le Lumeria... I'm Lumeria?

319953.「聞コエル 町ノ ミンナノ声！\n ミンナ コンナ身体 モウ嫌ダッテ！\n 早ク:
Hear the voices of the town! I don't like my
body! They say they want to be free as soon as
possible.

319954.「……なんだって！？ キミと僕のおかげで\n 死なずに済んだっていうのに\n な:
What? Thanks to YOU and me, they didn't die,
but what ungrateful people they are!

319955.「そうだ！ そんなに この暮らしが\n 気に食わないって言うなら お望みどおり\:
That's right! If you don't like this life so
much, I'll scrap you all as you wish.

319956.「キミが 帰ってきた以上\n あんな出来損ないの人形たちなんて 必要ない！\n:
Now that you're back, there's no need for
those worthless dolls! Let's destroy them all
and live happily on our own.

319957.「キャハッ スクラップ スクラップ！\n ミンナ コワス！ タノシイ タノシイナ:
Cahahhhh Scrap Scrap Scrap! Minna kowas!
Tanoshii tanoshii inna!

319958.「……チッ！ おい ポルテ！\n 俺から 離れるんじゃねえぞ！: ...damn it! Hey Porte, stay close to me!

319960.「住民たちの魂のケガレは\n すべて 浄化しました。:
All the soul injuries of the inhabitants were
purged.

319961.「ムニエカの町は 本当に美しい。\n みんな いつも 幸せそうに笑っていて……。:
Munieka is really beautiful. Everyone was
always happy and smiling. I wanted to keep
this brilliance forever...

319962.「ですが それは 大きな間違いでした。\n 終わりがあるからこそ ヒトは\n 限:
But that was a big mistake. It is precisely
because there is an end that humans try to be
happy in their limited lives.

319963.「だからこそ 町もヒトも 輝いて見えた。\n 私は 人々の生命の輝きに\n 魅せ:
That's why the town and its people seemed so
radiant. I was fascinated by the sparkle of
people's lives, wasn't I?

319964.「申し遅れました。我が名は ルーミリア。\n 偉大なる主神 グランゼニスより\n:
My apologies for the delay. My name is Lumeria, a protection angel entrusted by the great Lord God Gran Zenith to this land of
Munieka.

319965.「まさか ドロテアが 守護天使で\n こーんなキレイな おねーさんだったなんて\:
I was surprised to see Mudara as a protection
angel and such a nice lady.

319966.「あっ もちろん あの姿のドロテアも\n かわいくて 大好きだけどね！: Oh, Mochi, I love Mudara in that pose, too!

319967.「でへへ……キレイで かわいいなんて……\n あ ありがとうございますぅ……。\: I'm so happy to hear that... I'm so happy...

319968.「ところで あのう……。\n なぜ 皆さまは 私を\n 捜していたのでしょうか…:
By the way, umm... Why were you all looking
for me?

319969.「守護天使マギエル様が 私を……？\n 招集の時が 近いということでしょうか……:
Is the Protection Angel Magiel calling me...?
Does it mean that the time of convocation is
near...?

319970.「では こちらを お受け取りください。\n マギエル様から おあずかりしていたも:
Now, please accept this, which was given to me
by Mr. Magiel. I'm sure it will be of use to
you.

319972.「それから……\n これは 私からの 感謝の気持ちです。: And also... this is a thank you from me.

319973.「ねえ ルーミリア。聞いてもいい……？\n ムニエカの町の人たちは\n これから:
Hey Lumeria, can I ask... what is going to
happen to the people of Munieka?

319974.「ご主人様……エドアルドさんが これまで\n 皆さんの身体を 修理していましたが:
Master Eduardo has been repairing your bodies,
but there is no one in town who can do that
anymore.

319975.「おそらく 百年も経たず 身体が朽ち……\n 住民たちの魂は 人形から解放され\:
Perhaps in less than a hundred years, their bodies will decay and the souls of the inhabitants will be freed from the dolls and
taken to heaven.

319976.「地下にある聖花石は 作動していますから\n 人形が朽ちる前に 魂に\n ケガレ:
The sacred flower stone in the basement is
working, so I don't think there's any danger
of injury to the soul before the doll decays.

319977.「ムニエカは……終わりの時を 待つのみとなる。\n それが この町の 本来あるべ:
Munieka...will only wait for the end. Because
that is the way this town should be...

319978.「本当は今すぐ 私の手で みんなを\n 眠らせてあげるべきなのかも しれません。:
Perhaps I should really let you all sleep with
my hands right now. But...

319980.「皆さま ムニエカの町を お守りくださり\n 本当に ありがとうございます。\n:
Thank you very much for protecting Munieka. We
will never forget this debt of gratitude.

319981.「時が来たら お呼びください。\n どこであろうと 必ず はせ参じます。:
When the time comes, please call on me.
Wherever you are, we will be there.

319982.「どうか 貴方たちの人生が 最後の瞬間まで\n 幸せなものでありますように……。:
I wish you all a happy life until the very
last moment.

319984.「……良かったんだよ。\n この物語は ここで終わらせるべきなんだ。\n そう:
It was good. This story should end here.
That's what we have to believe, right?

319985.残りの守護天使を 目覚めさせるため\nほかの町へ 向かおう。:
Let's head to another town to wake up the rest
of the protection angels.

319986.これで ３人の守護天使を 目覚めさせた。\nはじまりの地へ 戻ろう。:
Now that we have awakened the three protection
angels, let's return to the Land of
Beginnings.

319987.「貴様らァ……よくも 僕のルーミリアをぉ……。\n 許さん……許さんぞぉッ！:
How dare you... how dare you take my
Lumeria...! I won't forgive you...I won't
forgive you...!

319988.「エドアルドさん 違うんです……。\n それは ルーミリアさんじゃない！\n 信:
Mr. Eduardo No... That's not Mr. Lumeria!
Please believe me...!

319989.「ハッ だまされないぞ……。\n 僕から ルーミリアを奪おうと\n 嘘をついてい:
I won't be fooled... You're lying to take
Lumeria away from me, aren't you?

319990.「彼女は 誰にも渡さない。僕だけのものだ。\n ふたりで 永遠に 幸せに暮らすん:
No one else can have her. She's mine and mine
alone. The two of us will live happily ever
after...! Hahahahahahaha..!

319992.「ギ ギギ……デキソコナイノ ニンギョウ\n ゼンブ スクラップ……オマエモ！\:
Gigi gigi...dekiso konaino ningyo zembu
scrapp...omae mo! Cahahahahahaha!

319995.「ああ 違う。\n この美しくて 優しい光……。\n キミは……キミこそが……:
Oh, no. This beautiful, gentle light... you
are... you are...

319997.「浄化の聖花石を作るため チカラのすべてを\n 使い果たした私は 自らの存在すら:
I had used up all of my energy to create the
sacred flower stone of purification, and I
could not even sustain my own existence...

319998.「消えかけていたところを\n 貴方の作った人形に 入りこんで\n どうにか 生き:
He was on the verge of disappearing, but
somehow he was able to live on by being inside
a doll that you had made.

319999.「自分が 何者であるのかも忘れ……\n 真実から 目をそむけてきた……。:
I have forgotten who I am and I have turned
away from the truth.

320000.「恐ろしかったんです。\n 死という現実を受け入れ すべてを……\n 大好きな貴:
I was afraid. To accept the reality of death,
of losing everything, of losing you, the
person I love so much.

320001.「でも どれだけつらくても 向きあわなくては。\n これ以上 ムニエカの民を\n:
But no matter how hard it is, we have to face
it. I can't let the people of Munieka suffer
any more.

320002.「これは……私の罪。\n すべて 受けとめます。: This is... my sin. I accept it all.

320003.「エドアルドさん しっかりして！\n エドアルドさん！:
Mr. Eduardo Pull yourself together, Mr.
Eduardo!

320004.「ルーミリア……君は\n ずっと そばに いてくれたんだね……。\n それなのに:
Lumeria...you were always there for me... And
yet, I didn't even notice...

320005.「ホント バカだよねぇ……。\n あまりに バカすぎて 笑っちゃうよ。\n アハ:
Really, he's an idiot, isn't he? It's so
stupid that I can't help laughing.
Aha...hahaha...

320006.「ごめんなさい……私のせいで みんなを……\n 貴方を 長い間 苦しませてしまっ:
Decline...I have caused everyone...you...so
much pain for so long...Decline Decline...

320007.「どうして 謝るんだい？ キミは\n 僕たちの命を救い 心から愛してくれた。\n:
Why are you apologizing? You saved our lives
and loved us with all your heart. We had some
hard times, but we were happy.

320008.「ねえ 見てくれたかい？ キミの愛した町を。\n 美しいだろう？ キミの喜ぶ顔が:
Hey, did you see this? The town that YOU love.
Isn't it beautiful? I worked so hard to make
you happy.

320009.「だからさ どうか 笑っておくれ……。\n ね ルーミリア……。: So, please, smile for me... Hey Lumeria...

320010.「……そう その顔だ。 \n ずっと その顔が見たくて 僕は……:
Yes, that face. I've always wanted to see that
face.

320011.「エドアルドさんの魂が砕けて……消えちゃった。\n 攻撃とケガレに 耐えられなか:
Mr. Eduardo's soul was crushed...he
disappeared. He couldn't withstand the attacks
and injuries...

320012.「……彼は 長い間ずっと ムニエカの町を\n 守り続けていました。こんな\n ボ:
...he had been protecting Munieka for so long.
Until he became such a wreck...for someone
like me...

320013.「彼の魂は もう どこにもいない。\n 二度と よみがえらせることは できません:
His soul is nowhere to be found. It cannot be
brought back to life again. You will never see
him again...

323661.「町の人たちのことを想うなら……\n あなたはもう 手を出すべきじゃない。\n:
If you care about the people in this town you
should stay out of it. Trust them and leave
them alone.

325662.<center>ここは 愛しい ムニエカの住民たちを\n見守り 管理するため 作:
This place was created to watch over and
manage the residents of our beloved Munieka.
My secret place.

325663.<center>我が名は ルーミリア……。\n偉大なる 主神グランゼニスから\n:
My name is Lumeria... An angel assigned by the
great Gran Zenith to protect Munieka.

325664.<center>ジア・クト念晶体の襲来から\nどれだけの月日が 経ったでしょう…:
How many months have passed since the Dia Kut
telecrystal attacked?

325665.<center>毎日 この場所で 住民たちの様子を見守り\n細心の注意を 払って:
Every day I watched over this place, paying
close attention to its inhabitants... but
finally, what I had feared had happened.

325666.<center>ある日 突然 住民のひとりが\n異常な言動を取りはじめ その果て:
One day, one of the residents suddenly started behaving abnormally, and in the end, he destroyed the doll's body and committed
suicide...

325667.<center>人形の身体となった 住民たちは\n歳を取らず 死も迎えない……不:
The inhabitants, in the bodies of dolls, do
not age and do not die... they are immortal.
For a long time, they lived an immortal life.

325668.<center>流れぬ水が にごりゆくのと同じように\n時の流れをせき止められた:
Just as water that does not flow becomes stagnant, the flow of time has been stopped, and a strong wound has been created in their
souls...

325669.<center>住民たちに異常が出るたび ひとりひとり\n浄化を施しましたが……:
Whenever the residents showed abnormalities, we purified them one by one, but... no matter how much we purified them, their souls would
soon accumulate injuries over the years.

325670.<center>このままでは 浄化が追いつかず\n住民たちの魂は 皆 闇に堕ちて:
At this rate, purification will not be able to keep up, and the souls of the residents will all fall into darkness and turn into
monsters...

325671.<center>もう二度と ムニエカの町を\n愛する者たちを 失いたくありません:
I don't want to lose Munieka lovers again... I
must finish it as soon as possible...

325672.<center>住民たちの魂のケガレに 対処するため\n私は 町の地下に ケガレ:
In order to deal with the souls of the inhabitants, I decided to build a device in the basement of the town that would absorb and
purify the souls of those who are suffering.

325673.<center>守護天使である私の ありったけのチカラを\nこの聖花石にこめ 町:
As a protection angel, I will put all my power into this sacred flower stone, absorbing and purifying all the injuries in the town at
once.

325674.<center>浄化の聖花石の完成まで あともう少し……。\n身体も精神も 限界:
I am very close to completing the Sacred Flower Stone of Purification... My body and spirit are reaching their limits, but even if
I lose everything, I must spear.

325675.<center>ムニエカの住民たちの……\n愛する人の笑顔を 守るために。\nだ:
The residents of Munieka...to protect the
smiles of their loved ones. But...

325676.<center>住民たちは ケガレから生じる絶望を\n抑えることができず そのす:
The residents, unable to contain their despair
from the kegare, took it all out on me.

325677.<center>どうして 自分たちは 理不尽に殺され\nこんなに苦しんでまで 生:
Why should we live our lives suffering so much
from being unreasonably killed? I am sad and
angry.

325678.<center>お前さえ この町に来なければ……。\nこの……疫病神め とも……:
If only you hadn't come to this town...
You...pestilent god...

325679.<center>毎日のように 住民たちから\n罵倒の言葉を浴びせられる。魂のケガ:
Everyday I am bombarded with abusive language
from the residents. I understand that this is
temporary due to soul injury...

325680.<center>聖花石さえ完成すれば 元の優しい皆さんに\n戻ってくれる。わかっ:
As long as the sacred flower stone is completed, you will all return to your former gentle selves. You should know that, but...
But....

325681.<center>どうして こんなことになってしまったのだろう。\n私はただ あの:
How could I have let this happen? I just
didn't want to lose that happy scene. I wanted
that person I love to smile...

325682.<center>もう……何も 考えたくない……。\n皆が言うように こんな私\n:
I don't want to think about anything anymore... I don't want to think about anything anymore... Just like everyone says, I
should just disappear...

325683.<center>ごめんなさい エドアルドさん。\n貴方と交わした約束は もう\n:
Decline Eduardo. I may not be able to keep the
promise I made to you anymore...
